CustomField.description: This is a backend checkbox formula to determine if the First Notice has been generated or not. The reason why this field has been created is so that I can apply a filter on the Final Notice button on the Lightning Page
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is a backend checkbox formula to determine if the First Notice has been generated or not. The reason why this field has been created is so that I can apply a filter on the Final Notice button on the Lightning Page
CustomField.label: First Notice Generated?
